ra.db.connection

Class OnceConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • ra.db.connection.OnceConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, DatabaseConnection
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MockOnceConnection

    public class OnceConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements DatabaseConnection
    Provide execute SQL statement using a database connection, and the connection is not thread safe. The connection is not keeping alive.
    Author:
    Ray Li
